categories: Category:The Official Black Spire Outpost Cookbook recipes

nodes.text: Tepasi taffy was a type of taffy. It shared its name with Tepasi, a location in the Core Worlds region of the galaxy. When smuggler Maz Kanata addressed the pirate Hondo Ohnaka by shouting his name, Ohnaka compared the drawn out pronunciation to Tepasi taffy.
Tepasi taffy was first mentioned in the canon junior novel Pirate's Price, which was written by Lou Anders and published in 2019.
